attributes.action: reverse decision not to pay back "overpayments" in puplic service pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to a miscalculation by a third party, public sector pensions are being cut by £44 per month.Or is this
a means of clawing back some of the money handed out to failing banks.
With millions of pensioners in the same boat, the Government could be raking in £200 million per month. 
In rewarding banks for gross misconduct, the Government on the other hand is  ripping off the most vulnerable innocents
